item.title: A toy engine. From 0 to Ludum Dare
item.description: Last November I started working on a toy DX12 renderer. At first my intention was to add a new backend for Milton, but after I got the first triangle going it became pretty addictive to just keep going and see where I could take it. Here’s a write-up of what I’ve got going! My main focus has been was on API design and the core rendering API. I wanted to have an engine I could use to write small games and test apps with as few lines of code as possible.
